Chinese Diplomats Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Chinese Diplomats Help Korean Farmers 
    Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Wu Donghe and staff members of the Chinese Embassy here went to the DPRK-China Friendship Thaekam Co-op Farm in Sunan District, Pyongyang on Sept. 18 to help its members in rice harvesting.
 The ambassador said that they were very pleased to give helping hands to the friendship farm, hoping that its members would register greater success in agricultural production this year true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.    
 The diplomats conveyed aid materials to the farmers.
